thread.title: Lush cosmetics defends ad campaign featuring naked women

title: Lush cosmetics defends ad campaign featuring naked women
text:
Lush cosmetics defends ad campaign featuring naked women 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Lush Australia will not change how it approaches marketing despite a decision by the Advertising Standards Board to uphold a complaint again...
